title: Utah and Minnesota Win on the Road and Philly Rolls at Home in Game 1 | Weekends With Wos
description:
Wos is joined by The Ringer’s J. Kyle Mann to discuss three of the four Game 1 matchups on the first day of the NBA playoffs. They start with Utah beating the short-handed Mavericks (1:32) and then get into Minnesota’s impressive performance in beating the Grizzlies on the road (4:22). They wrap up with the Sixers dominating the Raptors at home (21:31).

Host: Wosny Lambre
Guest: J. Kyle Mann
Associate Producer: Isaiah Blakely
